TopicTitle: Good intro to basic KSP modding?

Articles.Content: Where can i find a guide/tutorial post or video that covers all basics on getting into modding? I have quite a few ideas and i think learning how to mod would be a great way to spend my summer. Cheers, and thank you in advance.

Check the subform at the top of this section, it has a lot of random info, but there should be some pinned tutorials and part model and plugin basics, if maybe a little outdated by a version or two of the IDE tools or KSP itself. 

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/forum/104-general-mod-development-help-and-support﻿/

Check on the KSP discord too: https://discord.com/invite/kerbal 

 

Edited April 20, 2021 by Beetlecat

On 4/20/2021 at 4:32 AM, Beetlecat said:

Check the subform at the top of this section, it has a lot of random info, but there should be some pinned tutorials and part model and plugin basics, if maybe a little outdated by a version or two of the IDE tools or KSP itself.

Thanks, will do!
